short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In kintone's settings screen, '⇩download' saves settings as JSON, while '⇧upload' loads them back.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A brilliant Chrome extension for all those in charge of managing kintone plugins.

When you display the plugin setting screen of kintone, you will see '⇩download' and '⇧upload' buttons. 

The download button downloads the plugin setting as json. upload button loads the downloaded json as a plugin setting. 

The upload button loads the downloaded json as a plugin configuration.
